examineProjector.text: This projector ain't working. It's missing the lens

fixProjector.text: It fits the projector like a glove

choices.text: That sounds unbelievable. Wouldn’t anyone have looked for you or notice you’re gone?
World government? Are you on drugs?
What can I even do for you?

helpClare.text: Will you try to help John Clare?

choices.text: I'll try my best to help you

newspaper.text: Headline: Cult Leader John Clare Arrested
Following an unprecedented mass suicide tragedy, cult leader John Clare was finally apprehended after a violent siege against police forces.
This is a case that has shocked the world, the convict is awaiting trial but the public is already calling for the death penalty.
We will keep you updated as the case develops

examineperiodictable.text: A periodic table. It features all the elements known to man
H - hydrogen - 1 proton, He - Helium - 2 protons
Na - Sodium - 11 protons, Mg - Magnesium - 12 protons
Cl - Chloride - 17 protons, Ar - Argon - 18 protons
Who the hell remembers all this? That's right, no one! I'll write it down in a note
